summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the portfolio holdings and financial activities of Southern Financial LLC for the period from December 1, 2016, to December 31, 2016. It includes information on account values, gains and losses, and various asset allocations. This document contains a financial summary from Deutsche Bank detailing realized gains and losses for a specific period, including transactions related to securities, dividends, and interest. It outlines the account's performance, including credits and debits, and provides information on bond maturity schedules and market values. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC, detailing account information, pricing, and transaction disclosures for a specific account. It includes important information regarding securities, margin accounts, and arbitration disclosures, emphasizing the responsibilities of both the client and the financial institution. This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activities and portfolio holdings of Southern Financial LLC for the period of November 1, 2016, to November 30, 2016. It includes information on account values, cash deposits, withdrawals, and a summary of gains and losses, as well as detailed listings of equities, fixed income, and other financial instruments. This document contains a financial statement detailing realized gains and losses for a specific account during November 2016. It includes information on securities transactions, dividends, interest received, and various financial adjustments related to tax reporting. The document emphasizes the importance of consulting a tax advisor for accurate reporting. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account activity for a specific period. It includes information on securities transactions, account balances, and various financial disclosures. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate reporting and the responsibilities of the financial institution in managing client accounts. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings for an account associated with Deutsche Bank, including various fixed income securities, corporate bonds, and equities. It outlines the acquisition dates, quantities, costs, market values, and unrealized gains or losses for each security, reflecting the financial status of the account as of October 31, 2016. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing transactions, account balances, and investment information for a specific period. It includes information on securities bought and sold, dividends received, and fees incurred, as well as disclosures regarding the handling of accounts and securities. The document emphasizes the importance of consulting with a tax advisor for accurate reporting of gains and losses. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to accounts held at Deutsche Bank, including account balances, income, expenses, and portfolio holdings for the period from September 1, 2016, to September 30, 2016. It includes details on various investments, income generated, and the performance of different asset classes. This document contains detailed financial information regarding portfolio holdings, including equities, preferred stocks, and transactions related to securities. It outlines realized gains and losses, cost basis adjustments, and provides insights into the financial activities of an account associated with Epstein. The document emphasizes compliance with IRS reporting requirements and includes various financial metrics. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account information, bond market values, and client service information for an account managed by Daniel Sabba. It includes various disclosures about pricing, transactions, and account management practices. This document contains a detailed financial summary of assets, including gains and losses, income and expenses, and portfolio holdings as of August 31, 2016. It outlines various investment categories such as equities, fixed income, and cash management, providing insights into the financial status and transactions of the account. This document contains a detailed schedule of realized gains and losses for various securities held in an account, including transactions, dividends, and interest received during a specified period. It outlines the cost basis reporting rules and provides insights into the financial activities related to the account, including securities sold and income generated. This document contains financial statements and disclosures from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, detailing account activities, pricing of securities, and important information regarding transactions and investments. It includes estimated annual income figures, portfolio holdings, and arbitration disclosures related to account management. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings and financial transactions for Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, including various securities, their acquisition dates, costs, market values, and unrealized gains or losses. It also includes a schedule of realized gains and losses for specific securities disposed of during the reporting period. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account transactions, including securities bought and sold, dividends received, and fees incurred during the statement period of July 1, 2016, to July 31, 2016. It includes information about bond maturities and the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account activities, including deposits, withdrawals, and portfolio holdings for a specific account over a defined period. It includes information on various securities, their values, and performance metrics. This document contains detailed financial information regarding portfolio holdings, transactions, and realized gains and losses for a specified period. It includes data on various securities, dividends received, and cash transactions, highlighting the financial activities related to the account. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing transactions, account information, and disclosures related to securities held in a client's account. It includes information on bond maturity schedules, cash not yet received, and various disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing the account activities and portfolio holdings of Southern Financial LLC for the period from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016. It includes information on account values, transactions, and asset allocations, highlighting significant gains and losses in various investment categories. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing portfolio holdings, realized gains and losses, and transactions for a specific account during May 2016. It includes information on securities bought and sold, dividends received, and taxes withheld, providing insights into the financial activities associated with the account. This document contains a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account activity, asset summaries, and important disclosures regarding investments and transactions for a specified period. It includes information on bond quality, market values, and various financial metrics relevant to the account holder's portfolio. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings and financial transactions related to Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management for the period of April 2016. It includes information on various securities, their acquisition dates, quantities, costs, market values, and unrealized gains or losses. The document is marked as confidential and is part of the financial records relevant to the Epstein case. This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account transactions, including dividends, interest, and fees for the period from April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016. It provides insights into the account's performance, including securities bought and sold, cash withdrawals, and overall account value changes. This document provides a detailed financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, outlining asset allocations, gains and losses, and portfolio holdings for the period ending February 29, 2016. It includes information on various securities, including equities and fixed income, as well as income and expenses associated with these investments. This document contains detailed financial information regarding securities transactions, including realized gains and losses, cost basis adjustments, and account activity summaries. It emphasizes the importance of consulting a tax advisor for accurate reporting and outlines the implications of cost basis reporting rules under the Internal Revenue Code. This document contains account information and disclosures from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, detailing account activities, asset allocations, and financial summaries for a specified period. It includes important disclosures regarding reinvestments, pricing, and the role of Pershing as a clearing broker. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings for Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, including various equities, corporate bonds, and their respective financial metrics such as market value, unrealized gains/losses, and estimated annual income. It highlights the financial status of the portfolio as of January 31, 2016. This document contains a detailed financial statement related to realized gains and losses, transactions, and account information for a specific period. It outlines various securities transactions, dividends received, fees incurred, and cash withdrawals, along with a bond maturity schedule. The document emphasizes the importance of consulting a tax advisor for accurate reporting of gains and losses. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account information, pricing of securities, and disclosures related to investment transactions. It includes important information about account management, pricing sources, and arbitration agreements related to disputes. The document emphasizes the importance of verifying account details and understanding the implications of investment decisions.
